title: Adventures of a young eagle
creator_credit: Hungarofilm, Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Istvan Nagy
brief_description: The adventures of three young eagles living at the very top of a tree. One is frightened out of the nest while the parent birds are away. His survival illustrates that “learning” is an exciting part of the adventures of a young eagle. Designed to stimulate children to observe things around them, and stimulate creative expression.
